property.name: ipc.client.connection.maxidletime
property.description: the idle timeout interval of a rpc channel, rpc channel will exit if timeout

property.name: ipc.client.connect.max.retries
property.description: the max retry times when a rpc channel failed to connect to the server for any reason except timeout.

property.name: ipc.client.connect.max.retries.on.timeouts
property.description: the max retry times when a rpc channel failed to connect to the server since timeout.

property.name: ipc.client.connect.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval for a rpc channel to connect to the server.

property.name: ipc.client.write.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval for a rpc channel to write data into socket.

property.name: ipc.client.tcpnodelay
property.description: to set rpc channel to tcpnodelay mode.

property.name: dfs.ConfigKey.type
property.description: default checksum type, valid value is: CRC32, CRC32C, NULL

property.name: dfs.bytes-per-ConfigKey
property.description: the size of chunk to calculate checksum.

property.name: dfs.namenode.rpc.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval to the client to wait for the namenode to finish a rpc call.

property.name: dfs.datanode.rpc.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval to the client to wait for the datanode to finish a rpc call.

property.name: dfs.client-write-packet-size
property.description: the packet size for the output stream.

property.name: dfs.client.block.write.retries
property.description: the max retry time when output stream failed to write data to pipeline

property.name: dfs.client.close.file.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval to the output stream to wait for close file operation complete.

property.name: dfs.client.block.write.timeout
property.description: time timeout interval to the output stream to write data into socket.

property.name: dfs.prefetchsize
property.description: the number of block which metadatas will be prefetched.

property.name: dfs.client_local_block_read_buffer
property.description: the buffer size if read block from local file system instead of network.

property.name: dfs.client.socket.write.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval for socket write operation.

property.name: dfs.client.socket.read.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval for socket read operation.

property.name: dfs.client.socket.connect.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval to setup a tcp socket connection, include resolve host name.

property.name: dfs.client.read.verifychecksum
property.description: input stream will verify checksum, this can be overwritten when open input stream.

property.name: dfs.client.enable.read.from.local
property.description: enable input stream to read block directly from local file system. need to configure on server.

property.name: dfs.log.file.prefix
property.description: the libhdfs3 log file prefix, see glog document.

property.name: dfs.log.stderr
property.description: output libhdfs3 log to stderr.

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: the default number of replica, can be overwritten when create output stream.

property.name: dfs.blocksize
property.description: the default block size, can be overwritten when create output stream.

property.name: dfs.buffersize
property.description: not used yet, can be overwritten when create output stream.
